title: Interview Episode  3 - Joes Segal from Wende Museum
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
Joes Segal, Chief Curator of the Wende Museum, joins Jeff to discuss the Wende Museum and Joes own historical work which focuses on art and culture and he provides many interesting insights on art during the Cold War.   Join us for this fascinating look into cultural aspects of the Cold War. 

The Wende Museum, located in Los Angeles, centers around  preserving Cold War art, culture, and history from the Soviet Bloc countries and is considered a must see for any Cold War fan visiting Southern California.
Wende Museum: www.wendemuseum.org
